mdRecord.dcterms:description: Personal name, to which someone responds expressing they miss this person. Scribbled out, question about life, to which someone responds in the next photograph. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
OLIVIA PEABODY | I miss her | don't it make you sad to know that life is more than who we are? | NO. Stop being so EMO.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Life
Interpersonal relations
